mods.note: 4 Simla Drawing Office, No. 3933, March 1925. Scale 1 inch =2 miles.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘4. Shaikh Saad and Kut-Al-Amara. Battle of Shaikh Saad 5th to 7th January 1916’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:367 x 655 mm, on sheet 470 x 721 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Dehra Dun. Simla Drawing Office, No. 3933, March 1925. S.D.O. 3936.Distinctive Features:Map of Shaikh Saad and Kut-Al-Amara [Al-Kūt] compiled from ground and air reconnaissance, produced to illustrate the movements of the British and the Turkish military forces between 5th and 7th January 1916. Shows the location of troops, trenches and lines of advance with positions of headquarters indicated by symbols and explained in a key at the upper right hand corner. Map overprinted with numeric reference grid.Same base map as IOR/L/MIL/17/15/72/2, f 1.
